wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Harry,
I concur, I now have 3 vonage lines, $15 each, and leave 1/2 of that 500 minutes on the table at the end of the month. Customer support has been great. I have only used the online, But Mildred in NY has called and gotten personal assistance, and even got my 'spif' for the referal to her fixed while on line. A++ for Vonage, I hope the others keep pace, and make/keep it competitive.
Tom
